edu.sjsu.cs.cs151.model

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sjsu.cs.cs151.model.Rect
      • edu.sjsu.cs.cs151.model.Ball

  • public class Ball
extends Rect
    Ball is the rectangle that interacts with the player and block objects. The ball is actually a rectangle. Turns out the physics of the ball is just in swapping xDir / yDir to make it change directions.
    Author:
    Leo_Le
